prompts.find_control_center:
CRITICAL: You MUST respond with ONLY pixel coordinates, nothing else.

Look at this menu bar screenshot. Find the Control Center icon (two overlapping squares, top-right corner, near the clock/date).

Your ENTIRE response must be ONLY coordinates in this EXACT format:
(1400, 12)

Do NOT include any other text. ONLY the coordinates in parentheses.
prompts.find_screen_mirroring:
CRITICAL: You MUST respond with ONLY pixel coordinates, nothing else.

Look at this Control Center screenshot. Find the Screen Mirroring button (icon looks like two overlapping screens/displays, may have text 'Screen Mirroring').

Your ENTIRE response must be ONLY coordinates in this EXACT format:
(800, 300)

Do NOT include any other text. ONLY the coordinates in parentheses.
prompts.find_display:
CRITICAL: You MUST respond with ONLY pixel coordinates, nothing else.

Look at this Screen Mirroring menu. Find '{display_name}' in the device list (has TV/display icon next to the text).

Your ENTIRE response must be ONLY coordinates in this EXACT format:
(850, 450)

Do NOT include any other text. ONLY the coordinates in parentheses.
prompts.verify_connection: Look at this screenshot. Is there any indication that the display '{display_name}' is currently connected? Look for: checkmarks, connection indicators, the device showing as 'Connected', or the device appearing in a 'Connected Displays' section. Answer with just: YES or NO
